title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Week Date and Local Time of Day with Time Shift (Extended Format)
description: A representation of week date combined with complete local time of day and time shift from UTC in extended format [YYYY]["-"]["W"][ww]["-"][D]["T"][hh][":"[mm][":"[ss][±][hh][":"[mm] where the time shift includes hours and minutes (§5.4.2.3 b)
